text: asathya ithihasaya wenuwata sathya ithihasayata nila piliganimak labenne kawadada?

minisun thalapela paga damana dushta palana kramayak wenuwata minisunta aadaraya karana,owun rakina palana kramayak bihikirima siya darshanaya ha aramuna karagath che ge prathirupaya ohu ghathanaya kara 46 wasarak gatha unath nonasi pawathima thulinma me sonduru wiplawawadiyata minisun kotharam aadaraya karanawada yanna sithagatha haka.lowa kawara ho kodewwaka jiwith wana dukwindina minisun wenuwen nagi sitimata ohu dewarak sithuwe natha.aarjantinawedi upatha lada ohu kiyubanu wiplawayata uradi jayagrahanaya kara meheyanneda,awasana boliwiyanu wiplawaya meheyawamin jiwithaya puja karanneda ee nisamaya.kuda kala pawa mithuran atharadi kisiweku asadharanayata lak wi nam ee wenuwen peni ohu nopakilawa idiripath wiya.samahara awasthawala thama asadharana lesada durwalayage pasa gath bawa pasukalinawa ee athithaya sihipath karamin che pawasa thibuni...

apage dakma shri lankawa thula ha in baharawa lowa pura wisira sitina shri lankika kredit kadpath himikaruwange hadawathata wadath samipa wruththimaya blog adawiya bawata path wima.apage mehewara kredit kadpath saha ee aashritha oonama kshethrayak pilibandawa unanduwak dakwana, antharjalaye obamoba sarisarana, nithigaruka, wibhawa ganudenukaruwan ha sewadayakayan hakithak apa wetha aakarshanaya kara ganimin, upadeshanaya, danuwath kirima, wyaparika ha rajakari katayuthu sandaha lipi lekhana sakas kirima aadi sewa rasak nomile ho ese nohaki nam sadharana gasthuwakata yatathwa owun wetha kadinamin ha nirawadyawa laba demin, shri lankika kredit kadpath kshethraya mulumaninma nawum yugayak kara waha waha ragena yannemu.
